body.name: Black 6 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom, Large Double Dresser with Wide Drawers, Modern Chest of Drawers,Storage Organizer Dresser,Nursery Dresser,for Living Room, Hallway, Bedroom, Kids Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 1 min
features: 【Advice and After-Sales】 Our products require self-assembly, but the assembly process is simple and equipped with clear and concise instructions. In order to ship the product well, a foam shock absorption box package is taken. We also provide excellent after-sales service if there are any product problems.

【Multipurpose Usage】- This 6 drawers dresser can not only be an organizer of clothes but also can easily be applied to various living spaces: living room, children's room, hallway, entryway, closet and home office etc

【Modern Design】- This drawer dresser features a clean look. Various decorative styles are compatible with this modern chest of drawers. In addition to the necessary storage functions, the top can be used to create different decorative spaces depending on the usage.

【Metal slides and Handles】 This white dresser for kitchen is made of scratch-resistant, moisture-resistant MDF boards, and sturdy metal handles, a light wipe with a damp cloth will give the dressers & chests of drawers a fresh look. 6 drawers slide easily on ball bearings, allowing you to effortlessly push and pull drawers to keep your items neat.

【Space-saving and Large Storage Design】This dresser 6 drawer is suitable for small/narrow areas while providing ample storage space for the kitchen, entryway, study, and living room. 6 drawers can store spice jars, tableware, toys, and books, and the spacious tabletop can also hold keys, alarm clocks, photo frames, potted plants, and other daily necessities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Six-Drawer Cabinet Features: Overall size: 47.24" x 15.75"x 31.5" Material: MDF panel cabinet + metal legs Drawer size: 21.65" x 13.39" x 3.94" Color: white, black, grey Static load capacity of each drawer: 20 pounds Accommodation: Clothes, towels, toys, books, snacks, toiletries, bags, daily necessities and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Space and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this dresser from Amazon, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase. The first thing that caught my attention was the impressive amount of storage space it offers. With spacious drawers and a generous top surface, I was able to neatly organize all my clothing and accessories.The quality of this dresser is exceptional, considering its price point. The build is sturdy and the materials used seem durable. The drawers slide smoothly, without any sticking or difficulty, making it convenient to access my belongings.One of the standout features for me is the stylish design. The dresser's sleek finish and clean lines beautifully complement my bedroom decor. It adds an elegant touch to the overall ambiance of the room.Assembly was straightforward and hassle-free. With clear instructions and all necessary tools included, it only took me about an hour to put it together.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this dresser. It provides ample storage space, is well-constructed, and has a visually appealing design. If you're in need of a spacious and functional dresser, look no further!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a budget friendly, aesthetically pleasing chest of drawers - this one is a good choice. Easy to build and good size to fit in a corner of your room for extra storageOnly downside is drawers aren’t as big as I thought they would be and prob won’t do well holding heavier clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful piece of furniture!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a 6-drawer and 5-drawer chest I have been extremely pleased with my purchase. The sleek design of the chest fits perfectly in my bedroom, adding a touch of modern elegance to the space. Despite its stylish appearance, the chest was surprisingly affordable, making it a great value for the quality it offers.Upon assembling the chest, I found it to be sturdy and well-constructed. The drawers slide smoothly and provide ample storage space for my clothing and personal items. I was particularly impressed with the ease of assembly – the instructions were clear and all the necessary parts were included, allowing me to put it together in no time.Overall, I highly recommend this drawer to anyone in need of a reliable and attractive storage solution. Its combination of sleek design, affordability, sturdiness, and ease of assembly make it a standout product in its category. I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase and believe it offers excellent value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 6-drawer dresser from Amazon, and my experience has been exceptional. The assembly process was a breeze, thanks to the clear and concise instructions provided. The product arrived in perfect condition, well-protected by a foam shock absorption box package.One standout feature is the space-saving design, making it perfect for small or narrow areas. Despite its compact size, the dresser offers generous storage space, ideal for the kitchen, entryway, study, or living room. The six drawers are versatile, accommodating everything from spice jars and tableware to toys and books. The spacious tabletop adds further convenience, providing a stylish surface for keys, alarm clocks, photo frames, potted plants, and daily necessities.Crafted from scratch-resistant and moisture-resistant MDF boards, this dresser boasts durability. The sturdy metal handles not only contribute to its modern design but also ensure easy access to the six drawers. The metal slides allow for smooth opening and closing, maintaining a neat and organized space effortlessly.What sets this dresser apart is its multipurpose functionality. While perfect for organizing clothes, it seamlessly fits into various living spaces like the living room, children's room, hallway, entryway, closet, home office, and nursery. The modern design of this dresser adds a touch of elegance to any room, making it compatible with various decorative styles. Whether you need a practical storage solution or a stylish accent piece, this dresser delivers on both fronts.I'm also impressed with the after-sales service provided. Knowing that any potential issues will be addressed by their excellent customer support adds an extra layer of satisfaction to my purchase. Overall, I highly recommend this dresser for its quality, functionality, and modern aesthetic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but the assembly 😬
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dresser because it was time for a upgrade. This is a very elegant, affordable, and sturdy dresser. Has a decent amount of storage space that’s fits all of me and my boyfriends clothes. However, the directions were kind of confusing… the assembly took us four days. But I would recommend someone with the assembly process because this is not and I REPEAT this is not a one person job! But overall love the dresser!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, sturdy, no issues
reviews.reviewText: I like the color. It is study and good quality. The drawers are not mega deep, but that also means that it fits into tight spaces like in a closet. Plenty of room for cloths. The assembly is slightly more complex than IKEA, but fun for those who like those kinds of activities. No regrets, will use for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product drawers where scratched when delivered. Dresser is beautiful but there is not a lot of space in the drawers. Dresser is not very sturdy. Directions to assemble the dresser were not clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - would buy again
reviews.reviewText: Although it took a while to assemble, it was not difficult to put together. The dresser fit perfect in the built-in closet in our basement (we did keep the legs off to allow the dresser to fit under the hanging clothes). The drawers slide nicely. It is a really nice dresser for a good price!
